text: Berlinette is the second studio album by German experimental techno producer Ellen Allien, released in 2003 by Allien's label, BPitch Control. It was generally critically acclaimed, with a very high rating of 8.9 from Pitchfork. == Track listing == #"Alles Sehen" – 3:50 #"Sehnsucht" – 6:18 #"Trash Scapes Voc" – 0:58 #"Push" – 4:17 #"Trash Scapes" – 4:40 #"Augenblick" – 4:39 #"Wish" – 4:47 #"Abstract Pictures" – 4:55 #"Erdbeermund" – 4:13 #"Secret" – 4:07 #"Open" – 6:10 == Personnel == * Ellen Allien – vocals, lyrics, production * Sascha Ring – some drums * Stephan Szulzewsky – guitar on track 3 * Samuel Ingold – guitar on tracks 6, 7, and 11 ==References== Category:2003 albums Category:Ellen Allien albums Category:BPitch Control albums
title: Berlinette (album)
